attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to make children eligible for cancer treatment on the NHS weather it be in this country or if  they have to go to America children should have the right to have this treatment. their are so many other treatments that are free on the NHS that really shouldn't be yet these children are dying because they cant afford to get the treatment they need. we give millions to other countries to help them with poverty e.t.c but we can't dip into our countries fund to help our own then their is something seriously wrong!
